message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
Optional<Object> found = Iterators.tryFind(newIterator(...), my_predicate);
if (found.isPresent()) {
    Object value = found.get();
} else {
    // handle case where no element is found
}
<<<explanation>>>: Instead of using Iterators.find, you can use Iterators.tryFind which returns an Optional. Optional is a container object which may or may not contain a non-null value. If a value is present, isPresent() will return true and get() will return the value. If no value is present, isPresent() will return false and get() will throw NoSuchElementException.
